paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: For Tuvans rare variant of the BRCA2 gene (c.3875_3878delGTCT) was found.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with breast cancer in Tuvan patients.

variants.segregation_data: The variant was found in a breast cancer patient.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was specifically noted in the context of Tuvan ethnic group.
key_quotes: For Tuvans rare variant of the BRCA2 gene (c.3875_3878delGTCT) was found.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The pathogenic variant of BRCA2 gene (c.8208_8209insAG, p.Leu2737Serfs*2, rs483353122) was observed in young Tuvan BC patients.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with breast cancer in young Tuvan patients.

variants.segregation_data: The variant was found in a breast cancer patient.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was specifically noted in the context of Tuvan ethnic group.
key_quotes: The pathogenic variant of BRCA2 gene (c.8208_8209insAG, p.Leu2737Serfs*2, rs483353122) was observed in young Tuvan BC patients.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
